memberdef.name: QUARTERROUND
memberdef.initializer: a = PLUS(a, b); d = ROTATE(XOR(d, a), 16); \ c = PLUS(c, d); b = ROTATE(XOR(b, c), 12); \ a = PLUS(a, b); d = ROTATE(XOR(d, a), 8); \ c = PLUS(c, d); b = ROTATE(XOR(b, c), 7);

memberdef.argsstring: (ECRYPT_ctx *ctx, const u8 *key, u32 keysize, u32 ivsize)
memberdef.name: ECRYPT_keysetup
